title: Quarantine Zone OGN - Daniel H. Wilson (DC Comics)
description:
In the future, humanity has discovered the root of all evil: a virus that modifies the neural pathways for empathy. Those infected have been forcibly imprisoned in the Quarantine Zoneâ€”regardless of whether they choose to do good or evil.

Meanwhile, the rest of the world is sterile and crime-free, but permeated by an oppressive, paranoid fear of new outbreaks of the malnoro virus.

Written by New York Times best-selling novelist Daniel H. Wilson, QUARANTINE ZONE is an action/sci-fi original graphic novel that examines questions about free will and the nature of good and evil. Co-published with Alloy Entertainment.


Art by:Matt Ryan, Fernando Pasarin
Cover by:Massimo Carnevale
Written by:Daniel H. Wilson

Book Type: Original Graphic Novel
U.S. Price: 22.99
On Sale Date: Mar 16 2016
Binding: Hardcover

Pages : 160
Format : CBZ
